mapper.sql: id, ap_user_id, ap_author_id, name, password, salt, nickname, image, location, phone, status, email, role_type, login_time, created_time
mapper.select: select from wm_user where name=#{name} and role_type=#{roleType}
mapper.insert: insert into wm_user (id, ap_user_id, ap_author_id, name, password, salt, nickname, image, location, phone, status, email, roleType, score, login_time, created_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apAuthorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
